errors.error_description: Specified Python 2.7 which is outdated and incompatible with current Font Bakery versions
correction_candidates: Make sure you have Python 3.8+ installed before proceeding with the installation.
Make sure you have Python 3.6 or higher installed before proceeding with the installation.
Make sure you have the latest Python version installed before proceeding with the installation.
Make sure you have Python 3.7+ installed before proceeding with the installation.
errors.golden_answer: Make sure you have Python 3.8+ installed before proceeding with the installation.

errors.error_description: Used invalid command syntax with incorrect parameter format for output file
correction_candidates: To run Font Bakery on your fonts, use the command: `fontbakery check-universal --html report.html *.ttf`
To run Font Bakery on your fonts, use the command: `fontbakery check-universal *.ttf --html report.html`
To run Font Bakery on your fonts, use the command: `fontbakery check-googlefonts --html report.html *.ttf`
To run Font Bakery on your fonts, use the command: `fontbakery check-universal --output report.html *.ttf`
errors.golden_answer: To run Font Bakery on your fonts, use the command: `fontbakery check-universal --html report.html *.ttf`
